title: Ory
description: Ory is the leading open-source authentication identity management, account registration, login and authorization ecosystem and community in the world. Our commercial product Ory Network combines our open-source know-how and provides additional value add services on top. With this we establish a global zero trust, scalable and secure platform for managing identities and its distribution across various internet services, including IoT. Ory is a modern software start-up founded in 2019 that promotes an open, diverse, and collaborative working culture.
